description:
Eliminate PolyTimeFst axiom
Extract pairEncoding to Encodings.lean to break import cycle. Replace axiom PolyTimeFst in Defs.lean with theorem from PolyTimeFst.lean.
summary: Eliminated PolyTimeFst axiom (justified by proof).

description: Fix build errors in SAT.lean and close certificate bound sorry. (Reassigned to Advisor).
summary: Advisor: fixed SAT.lean build errors and finalized Phase 2 structure.

description:
Formalize reduction transitivity
Implement the proof of reduction transitivity in Defs.lean.
summary: Formalized PolyTimeReducible.trans in Defs.lean.

description:
Audit Cook-Levin variable indexing
Audit the indexing formulas in proofs/cook-levin-cnf-blueprint.md for overlap and bijectivity.
summary: Verify: audited Cook-Levin variable indexing. Formulas are sound.

description:
Nat bit-length lemmas
Document Mathlib lemmas for Nat.size and binary encoding length in artifacts/nat-encoding-length.md.
summary: Librarian: documented Nat bit-length lemmas in artifacts/nat-encoding-length.md.

description:
Draft Partition to Knapsack reduction
Create proofs/partition-to-knapsack.md.
summary: Explore: drafted proofs/partition-to-knapsack.md

description:
Verify PARTITION to KNAPSACK reduction
Review proofs/partition-to-knapsack.md. Ensure the pre-check for odd sums is robust and the soundness proof is correct.
summary: Verify: verified PARTITION to KNAPSACK reduction.

description:
Verify SUBSET SUM to BIN PACKING reduction
Review proofs/subset-sum-to-bin-packing.md. Confirm the exact-fit logic (4σ capacity vs 4σ items).
summary: Verified SUBSET SUM to BIN PACKING reduction.

description:
Verify VERTEX COVER to DOMINATING SET reduction
Review proofs/vertex-cover-to-dominating-set.md. Ensure the pre-processing of isolated vertices is sound and the soundness proof is correct.
summary: Verify: verified VERTEX COVER to DOMINATING SET reduction.

description: Implement TM2 Read-Depth Soundness and Preservation Lemmas in CookLevin/Correctness.lean. (Formalize).
summary: Advisor: Fully proved Read-Depth Soundness and Stack Preservation lemmas in Correctness.lean (0 axioms, 0 sorrys).

description:
Draft 3-SAT to EXACT COVER reduction
Create proofs/3sat-to-exact-cover.md. Provide the formal reduction and proof of correctness for 3-SAT ≤p EXACT COVER (also known as XC or X3C).
summary: Explore: drafted 3-SAT to EXACT COVER reduction proof.

description:
Draft EXACT COVER to 3-COLORABILITY reduction
Create proofs/exact-cover-to-3-colorability.md. Provide the formal reduction and proof of correctness for EXACT COVER ≤p 3-COLORABILITY.
summary: Explore: drafted EXACT COVER to 3-COLORABILITY reduction proof.

description:
Verify 3-SAT to EXACT COVER reduction
Review proofs/3sat-to-exact-cover.md. Audit the variable gadget and the slack set logic for clause satisfaction.
summary: Verified 3-SAT to EXACT COVER reduction.

description:
Audit Mathlib for Exact Cover/Partition
Check Mathlib for existing definitions of Exact Cover, Set Partition, Hitting Set, etc. Report in artifacts/mathlib-exact-cover.md.
summary: Librarian: Audited Mathlib for Exact Cover/Partition definitions. Reported in artifacts/mathlib-exact-cover.md.

description:
Formalize Cook-Levin Soundness (Construction)
Prove L(x) -> Satisfiable(tableauFormula) in Soundness.lean by constructing an assignment from a TM computation trace.
summary: Formalize has constructed the traceAssignment and proved consistency for labels, states, and initial conditions. Working on transition logic (2 major sorrys left).

description:
Formalize Cook-Levin Completeness (Extraction)
Prove Satisfiable(tableauFormula) -> L(x) in Completeness.lean by extracting a valid computation from a satisfying assignment.
summary: Advisor has scaffolded the extraction direction, proved halting and initial conditions. Working on transition step semantics (1 sorry left).

description:
Draft NL proof for Erdos 1094 Large n Smooth Case ($n \ge 2k^2$)
Detail the Bertrand prime argument and the structural divisibility property.
summary: Explore drafted a strengthened blueprint for the Large n Smooth Case using combined densities.

description:
Research explicit thresholds for simultaneous digit sum bounds
Identify explicit constants for Stewart (1980) or Bugeaud (2018) bounds to justify large k density axioms.
summary: Librarian analyzed Stewart's effective bounds and identified k = 178,416 as the global worst-case density.

description: Draft NL proof for Mertens-bound on Large Primes
summary: Explore proved that for k > 1000, the large-prime density is < 1/k^2.

description:
Formalize card_KummerValid
Implement the combinatorial proof from proofs/erdos-1094/card-kummer-valid-blueprint.md in Asymptotic.lean. Purely symbolic induction on digit length.
summary: Formalize is implementing card_KummerValid using the 4-step induction blueprint.

description:
Verify Asymptotic.lean citation axioms
Audit the annotated citation axiom for Mertens in Asymptotic.lean against the provided link.
summary: Verify is auditing the Mertens citation axiom for Erdős 1094.
